Title: Eliminates the ability of landlords of rent regulated housing accommodations to charge certain rent increases upon succession by a family member; repealer
Summary: Eliminates the ability of landlords of rent regulated housing accommodations to charge certain rent increases where all tenants named in a lease have permanently vacated a housing accommodation and a family member of such tenant or tenants is entitled to and executes a renewal lease for the housing accommodation.
LawCode: Rpld ยง26-512 sub f, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision f of section 26-512 of the administrative code of the city of New York relating to eliminating the ability of landlords of rent regulated housing accommodations to charge certain rent increases where all tenants named in a lease have permanently vacated a housing accommodation and a family member of such tenant or tenants is entitled to and executes a renewal lease for the housing accommodation
